entry.title: 6 channels, 1 franchise illegal? Cable operator disputes peer's claim against ABS-CBN | ANC

media:group.media:title: 6 channels, 1 franchise illegal? Cable operator disputes peer's claim against ABS-CBN | ANC
media:group.media:description:
A group of cable operators rejected Thursday its peer's accusations of supposed violations by ABS-CBN Corp. which allegedly merit its closure.

entry.title: Richard Gomez hopes ABS-CBN shutdown is just temporary | ANC

media:group.media:title: Richard Gomez hopes ABS-CBN shutdown is just temporary | ANC
media:group.media:description:
Ormoc City Mayor Richard Gomez is one with his colleagues in the entertainment industry who are in danger of losing their jobs after ABS-CBN was forced to shut down its TV and radio operations on May 5 following the expiration of its franchise.

entry.title: COVID-19 pandemic shrinks Philippines GDP in 1st quarter of 2020 | ANC

media:group.media:title: COVID-19 pandemic shrinks Philippines GDP in 1st quarter of 2020 | ANC
media:group.media:description:
The Philippine economy shrank in the January to March period, for the first time since 1998, due to the COVID-19 pandemic and resulting lockdown, officials.Â Gross domestic product contracted by 0.2 percent, according to data released by the government.

entry.title: Blindsided by NTC order, Poe says ABS-CBN shutdown a wake-up call to lawmakers | ANC

media:group.media:title: Blindsided by NTC order, Poe says ABS-CBN shutdown a wake-up call to lawmakers | ANC
media:group.media:description:
MANILA - Senator Grace Poe on Thursday said they were blindsided by the National Telecommunications Commission's cease and desist order against ABS-CBN after both Houses of Congress already signified their intention to extend the network a provisional authority to operate after its franchise expired.

entry.title: Q1 GDP slowdown signals contraction in Q2: economist | ANC

media:group.media:title: Q1 GDP slowdown signals contraction in Q2: economist | ANC
media:group.media:description:
The slowdown of economic growth in the first quarter of 2020 signals a contraction in the next quarter, Carlo Asuncion of Unionbank told ANC's Market Edge.

entry.title: Pacquiao prays Duterte will order NTC to allow ABS-CBN to operate | ANC

media:group.media:title: Pacquiao prays Duterte will order NTC to allow ABS-CBN to operate | ANC
media:group.media:description:
Sen. Manny Pacquiao said Thursday he hopes President Rodrigo Duterte would order the National Telecommunications Commission to allow ABS-CBN to operate beyond its lapsed franchise.
